notes.note: ***NON JOHNSON GRAD AND UG SENIORS ONLY*** This course may be dropped from Thursday, September 12 through Friday, September 20 only with signed instructor permission. It will NOT be permitted to drop this course after 12 midnight on Friday, September 20. The ONLY exception will be a serious medical condition or event, and a doctorÂ¿s note will be required for verification. [Note that dropping a class, under any circumstances, after October 18 will result in a W (withdrawal) appearing on the student's transcript.] Add/Drop Dates: August 12th at 8:00am to September 11th at 4:00pm. You may add or drop a full semester class after September 11th with permission of the faculty. A late fee of $100.00 will be charged for each add or drop transaction. If you are dropping after October 18th you will also receive a "W" on your transcript in addition to the late fees.
